name: Dilemma 2
description: The crisis of resources on Earth forces people to go in search of new sources of energy. After a long journey on Mars, a new unique mineral is discovered – Delirium, which should solve most of the problems of earthlings. But, as it often happens, the intervention of people has awakened unknown creatures who clearly do not want to give the mineral to people so easily. A bloody war begins. You are waiting for the end of a science-fiction dilogy about space, fate and justice. The main character, who has lost his memory and by the will of fate found himself on Mars, finds himself involved in a conflict. He will not only have to remember his past, but also discover the secret of the origin of hostile creatures, save friends and solve his main dilemma – what is his purpose.
